body:
Alter Procedure SP15_BaglantiyiKopar @spid Int
As
Set NoCount On
Begin
    /*
		Yazan	: guncel
		Tarih	: 18.06.2023
		Açıklama:
	*/
    Begin Try

        Declare @SQL NVarchar(Max)

		--Raiserror('<%d> parametresi alınamadı!',16,1, @spid)

        Set @SQL = N'KILL ' + CAST(@spid As NVarchar(10));

        Exec (@SQL);
    End Try
    Begin Catch
        Declare @ITObjectName NVarchar(126);
        Set @ITObjectName = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID);
        Execute SP15_GenerateError @ITObjectName;
    End Catch
End
Go
